job_description:
Position: Backend Engineer - Java

Job Type: Full Time/Remote

Project: One of the Fortune 500's

Responsibilities

Create new and existing components, test, debug them, and document them to make sure that the software satisfies operational, quality, and business requirements.
Create unit and integration testing when writing high-quality code.
Create and implement RESTful APIs utilizing Java's Microservices framework.
Using NodeJS and Lambdas, design and implement functionalities.
Take part in code reviews to make sure new code complies with the strictest requirements.
Conduct research on emerging technologies and promote their use.
Work with the team to swiftly and effectively troubleshoot issues at the code level.
A propensity for learning new technologies and processes as well as excellent technical problem-solving abilities.
To ensure that our platform is available around-the-clock, respond to escalated events on a rotating basis after work hours or on the weekends.

Minimum Requirement

A BS or MS in computer science or a technical degree connected to it.
Experience creating scalable, distributed applications for more than Six to Seven years.
An important contributor to a sizable scattered team.
Significant expertise using Java 8 and ReactJS for object-oriented programming.
Solid familiarity with Amazon Web Services.
Significant Spring Boot framework expertise.
Knowledge of containerization software like Docker.
Proven expertise in creating backend systems or API platforms for the cloud.

Nice To Have

Previous CI/CD work experience is a preferred qualification.
Knowledge of Docker-built containers.
Comprehensive database and AWS knowledge.
